entry.title: Artificial General Intelligence
entry.quote: This page contains up-to-date information about the field of Artificial General Intelligence (AGI), collected and organized according to my judgment, though efforts are made to avoid personal biases.

entry.title: The Lines of Code That Changed Everything
entry.quote: Apollo 11, the JPEG, the first pop-up ad, and 33 other bits of software that have transformed our world.

entry.title: What comes after Zoom?
entry.quote: Zoom is the Skype of video - it turned a technology few people used much into a mass-market product. But next we’ll get the equivalents of Instagram and Snap - products that ask different questions. Zoom solved getting into a call, but why are you in the call?

entry.title: Want to pwn a satellite? Turns out it's surprisingly easy
entry.quote: A study into the feasibility of hacking low-Earth orbit satellites has revealed that it's worryingly easy to do.

entry.title: 80% of bosses say they regret earlier return-to-office plans: ‘A lot of executives have egg on their faces’
entry.quote: “Many companies are realizing they could have been a lot more measured in their approach, rather than making big, bold, very controversial decisions based on executives’ opinions rather than employee data,”
